resources.string: See and Rate news you have not rated till now, swipe right to Like and left to Dislike, News that are rated by you will not be shown here.
See your personalised news, select topics and its order from News Topic section and see only those news, in that order
select favourite news topic and see news from only those topics in Your news section, you can also change the order of the news by long pressing and shifting topics
View your profile information, see what you have liked and disliked in Briefs
Chat with people about current news, and share your views
